        public <T> java.lang.Object evaluate(java.lang.String expression,
                                     T bean)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Given the expression and a map of parameters, evaluate the expression returning the result.
        Parameters:
        expression - the JEXL expression e.g. (A + B / C)
        bean - the key value map if parameters (A = 2, B = 4, C = 2)
        Returns:
        the result of evaluating the expression against the parameters e.g.( 4 )
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
